name: Spider and skull
description:
Play an amazing and Thrilling game, where you have to Avoid the incoming enemies ie the skull.

Controls :

Mobile device: use the controls to move and shoot.

Pc : use up down left right for movment and left mouse button to shoot.

Objective: Avoid the enemy and survive as long you can. Use the power shield to destroy all enemies for 5 second.

You have 20 ammo which will refill itself. 

Play and Share the game with your friends
